title: Problem with payment by visa and mastercard
body:
It shows that:
Credit card transactions are processed in Ireland and many incur an international charge from your bank. Please contact your bank for more information.
What can I do for this?
I have paid $35 twice, on Visa and Mastercard respectively, but I didn't receive RP that my paid for.
What's the problem????

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support, they'll be able to help you work out what's going on.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
